com.jweb.dao

Class AuthorDAO

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.jweb.dao.DAO
      • com.jweb.dao.AuthorDAO

  • public class AuthorDAO
extends DAO
    The author Data Access Object : create, read, update or delete an author. Extends the DAO abstract class.
    Author:
    Julie
    See Also:
    DAO, DAOException
